text: He imanavala'o! N'yaya karavamam majabuta'i sathe adaga rahenara ane allahani prasannata mate saci saksi apanara bani ja'o, bhalene te tamara potani virud'dha hoya athava potana mata-pita athava sagansambandhi'ona virud'dha hoya, te vyakti jo dhanavana hoya to ane gariba hoya to banneni sathe allahane vadhare sambandha che, etala mate tame maneccha'oni pachala padi n'yaya karavanum na chodi do ane jo tame khoti saksi apo ane alaga rahya to jani lo ke je kami pana tame karaso allaha ta'ala te vise puri rite jananara che
